reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 9, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Disappointed. I wanted a cook top;Not a building project. Cheaply madeAnd inadequacies abound. The dripTray had to be forced into place withno means of securing to the stove topIt's self. The item as a whole is reminiscentOf a Chinese joke on the American consumer.I gave it away to keep from being remindedOf what a fool I had become thinking honorAnd pride still existed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Assembly and fit
reviews.reviewText: Top didn't fit. Had to make some adjustments and rig it to make it fit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 2 burner to go
reviews.reviewText: Really easy to assemble and use. Double burner stove any where you go. The shelves underneath really are nice too. Awesome quality and great value and looks great!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: This stove was not easy to assemble because it did not have any instructions or pictures. The pre-cut holes were not aligned or either not pre-cut all the way. So we had issues putting the screws in. If we did get the screws in, it would not be aligned. The shelves are flimsy. The stove comes with a propane hose and valve connection. Overall it is decent for when the electricity goes out and you need to be able to cook. We are a family of 4 and it helps in emergencies but I would not use it on a regular basis. We did finally find instructions on the description of the item on Amazon, you'll find a pdf file with the instructions. I wish we would have known that sooner.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great for camping
reviews.reviewText: This really helped out when we needed something to take with us for our road trip as we camped around. The extra shelves really come in handy to store food especially if you have a net to cover your food. It heats up well and is sturdy enough for what we need it for. Setup was a bit difficult, we managed to figure it all out in the end— well, my husband did. Great for camping or if you’re doing long road trip across country and avoiding hotel stays. Overall it’s a good stove to use. I took a star off because it’s not as sturdy as other models I’ve seen, and could be sturdier with better materials. I still would recommend this though because it does cook meals well and it can be travelled without taking up so much space. It’s still a win in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Not a good product, came bent with missing parts
reviews.reviewText: This stove came bent and the nuts were missing to put it together. This item is not returnable also.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for outdoor cooking
reviews.reviewText: Love the stove but not so much the stand. It’s a bit wobbly. I use it in my backyard for daily cooking and frying. Stove heats up pretty quickly and cooks the food evenly. I’m planning to transfer the stove to a sturdier table with wheels. Then it’s perfect.
